response.original_title: Alice: A Look into Alice's Adventures in Wonderland and at the Curious Relationship Between Alice Liddell and Lewis Carroll
response.overview: "Alice: A Look Into Alice's Adventures in Wonderland and at the Curious Relationship Between Alice Liddell and Lewis Carroll" examines the coming together of the writer, Lewis Carroll, and the little girl named Alice who inspired him, the society they inhabited, their relationship that is still the subject of much controversy, and the effect it had on their subsequent lives.
response.title: Alice: A Look into Alice's Adventures in Wonderland and at the Curious Relationship Between Alice Liddell and Lewis Carroll
